articles.description: The New York-based airline is adding 24 new routes in 2021, the latest airline to move planes where travelers are vacationing during the pandemic.
articles.content:
Some etiquette experts recommend letting the flight staff deal with a person refusing to wear a mask.
USA TODAY
Airlines are moving their planes wherever they think they can fill them as the corona… [+2366 chars]

articles.title: McDonald's is putting cameras in dumpsters. Here's why - CNN
articles.description: Compology is installing cameras in its clients dumpsters to help curb recycling contamination. For companies like McDonald's that also means cutting back on costs and emissions associated with unnecessary dump truck pickups.
